entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
